title: Arabic in indesign
content:
I am looking for some advice on how to handle arabic content in indesign, and came across Typophile.com in the process.  
If some of you should have any experience with indesign and arabic text, I would be happy to hear from you.

Also, if someone can recommend arabic fonts that works well I would appreciate it.

\*marlene
author: Marlene Hald

comments.content: Marlene, only **InDesign ME** (Middle East) can set Arabic text. InDesign ME is available from Winsoft.
